name: StellarShip DEMO
description:
An arcadey space shooter, heavily inspired by classic games like galaga, asteroid and space invaders! This is a fairly rough and early version of the game with much more to come. 

Some of the things I plan to add include more bosses, a light narrative as well as 3 or 4 additional ships with unique feels and weaponry!

Any and all feedback is appreciated! :)

OBS! The game currently has no tutorial, so make sure to read the 'controls.txt' file to learn how to fly. Don't worry though, the controls are very simple!
